name: Product Classifications
short_description: Parent category for all product-related classifications

name: Revenue
long_description: Money received from customers as payment for goods or services

name: Sales Amount
long_description: Amount charged to customer for a single transaction

name: Discount Amount
long_description: The monetary reduction from the standard list price

name: Product ID
long_description: System-generated unique identifier for each product

name: Customer ID
long_description: System-generated unique identifier for each customer

name: Region
long_description: Territory or region for sales classification

name: Customer Legal Name
long_description: Full legal name of the customer entity

name: Customer Segment
long_description: Classification of customer by type or size

name: Customer Status
long_description: Whether customer is active or inactive
